PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 31 As shown in Figure 6b , in contrast , when the PQCDTB / PC71BM ratio was 1 : 2 , the polymers were assembled , and a large domain was formed.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PC71BM |
| 1 : 2 (ratio of PQCDTB to PC71BM) |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "PQCDTB", "PC71BM", and the "1 : 2" ratio of PQCDTB to PC71BM. These entities are mentioned as key factors in the formation of a large domain in the polymers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PC71BM |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Material Property" are "PQCDTB" and "PC71BM". These entities are mentioned as materials used in the formation of polymers. The "1 : 2" ratio of PQCDTB to PC71BM was not included as it is not a material property, but rather a ratio used in the experiment.

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 31 As shown in Figure 6b , in contrast , when the PQCDTB / PC71BM ratio was 1 : 2 , the polymers were assembled , and a large domain was formed.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1 : 2 |
| PC71BM |
| PQCDTB |

In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entities refer to the specific values and materials involved in the experiment. These entities include the ratio of PQCDTB to PC71BM (1 : 2), as well as the names of the two materials themselves (PQCDTB and PC71BM).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1 : 2 |

In this paragraph, the only clear "Value of material property" entity is the ratio of PQCDTB to PC71BM (1 : 2). The names of the two materials themselves (PQCDTB and PC71BM) do not clearly refer to a value of a material property, so they are not included in the table.
